keyMoments.description: Defeats Zoro for the 2001st consecutive time
keyMoments.significance: Establishes her as Zoro's greatest rival and superior in skill

keyMoments.description: Defeats Zoro in a duel with real swords, wielding the Wado Ichimonji
keyMoments.significance: Their final duel showcasing mutual respect and determination

keyMoments.description: Makes a vow with Zoro that one of them will become the world's greatest swordsman
keyMoments.significance: Creates the promise that defines Zoro's entire journey and motivation

keyMoments.description: Dies after falling down a staircase at the dojo
keyMoments.significance: Her death becomes the catalyst for Zoro's unwavering dedication to their shared dream

reveals.description: Introduced as the daughter of Koushirou and the strongest student at Isshin Dojo
Revealed to be a prodigy swordsman who has defeated Zoro 2001 consecutive times
Established as Zoro's childhood friend, rival, and distant cousin
Died at age 11 from falling down stairs while looking for a whetstone

abilities.name: Swordsmanship
abilities.description: Exceptional skill with a sword, able to defeat all students at the dojo including Zoro 2001 times

relationships.description: Childhood rival and friend who competed with Zoro and made a promise to become the world's greatest swordsman
Close friend who shared the same dream and pushed each other to become stronger
Daughter of Koushirou, master of Isshin Dojo

keyMoments.description: Introduced as the master of Isshin Dojo and Kuina's father
keyMoments.significance: Established as Zoro's teacher and mentor in swordsmanship

keyMoments.description: Entrusts Zoro with the Wado Ichimonji after Kuina's death
keyMoments.significance: Passes on Kuina's treasured sword to Zoro, showing faith in him to carry on her legacy

reveals.description: Introduced as the master of Isshin Dojo in Shimotsuki Village
Revealed to be Kuina's father and Zoro's teacher
Runs the Isshin Dojo where Zoro trained after being defeated by Kuina

abilities.name: Swordsmanship
abilities.description: Master swordsman and teacher of the Isshin Dojo, skilled enough to train students including Zoro

relationships.description: Zoro's swordsmanship teacher and master at Isshin Dojo

voiceActors.japanese: Unshō Ishizuka (Episode 19 - Episode 1029), Kenji Nomura (Episode 1030 onwards)

keyMoments.description: Attacks the Going Merry after Luffy fires a cannon at the rock where he was resting
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Johnny, revealing his connection to Zoro from their bounty hunting days

keyMoments.description: Offers to guide the Straw Hats to the Baratie restaurant
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the transition to the Baratie Arc where Sanji will join the crew

reveals.description: Introduced as a bounty hunter and old friend of Zoro
Revealed to have worked with Zoro as a bounty hunter before Zoro joined the Straw Hats
Works as a bounty hunting duo with Yosaku

abilities.name: Swordsmanship
abilities.description: Basic sword fighting skills, though not at the level of more skilled fighters

relationships.description: Former bounty hunting partner and friend from before Zoro became a pirate
